properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from High Island to Freeport TX out 20 NM; Coastal waters from Freeport to Matagorda Ship Channel TX out 20 NM; Matagorda Bay
properties.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued March 3 at 1:15AM CST until March 3 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Houston/Galveston TX
properties.description:
* WHAT...Dense fog will reduce visibility to one nautical mile
or less.

* WHERE...Matagorda Bay, Coastal waters from Freeport to
Matagorda Ship Channel TX out 20 NM and Coastal waters from
High Island to Freeport TX out 20 NM.

* WHEN...Until noon CST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Low visibility will make navigation difficult.
properties.instruction:
If you must navigate, proceed with caution. Use proper fog
signals. Make sure all running lights are on. Remember to use
your radar and compass.

NWSheadline: DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY
